# NSN Database Subscription Website - Progress Tracker

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file exists
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project structure
- [x] Install required dependencies
- [x] Create configuration files
- [x] Build UI components
- [x] Implement authentication
- [x] Create dashboard and NSN search
- [x] Integrate Stripe subscriptions
- [x] Create documentation

## Project Overview
Subscription-based web application for NSN database access with:
- Next.js 14 with App Router and TypeScript
- Supabase for database and authentication
- Stripe for subscription payments
- Tailwind CSS for modern UI

## Completed Features
✅ Next.js 14 project structure with TypeScript
✅ Tailwind CSS styling configured
✅ Supabase authentication (login/signup)
✅ Protected routes with middleware
✅ Dashboard with NSN search functionality
✅ Stripe subscription integration
✅ Payment checkout flow
✅ Webhook handlers for subscription events
✅ Modern, responsive UI components
✅ Comprehensive documentation

## Next Steps
1. Set up your Supabase project and run supabase-setup.sql
2. Configure environment variables in .env
3. Set up Stripe products and webhooks
4. Import your NSN data
5. Test the application locally
6. Deploy to production
